headline: Revolution Medicines stock falls after Merck reportedly ends acquisition pursuit
summary: Investing.com -- Merck & Company Inc (NYSE:MRK) has ceased discussions to acquire biotechnology firm Revolution Medicines Inc (NASDAQ:RVMD), following a failure to reach an agreement on the company’s valuation. According to the Wall Street Journal, citing people familiar with the matter, the drug giant had been exploring a deal that could have valued the cancer-focused biotech at approximately $30 billion.
